welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vitre, France! Get ready to be charmed by our picturesque streets, medieval castle, and delightful culinary scene. Enjoy your stay and don't forget to discover all the beauty our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Entrammes Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Entrammes Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jacques Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at St Jacques Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be found on screens and information desks.
